Key Match Events: Spencer Torkelson hit a two-run home run in the second inning.
Kerry Carpenter added an RBI single in the third inning.
Mickey Moniak hit a 409-foot homer to right-center in the sixth inning.
Jason Foley pitched the ninth inning for his 19th save.
Post-Match Reflections: Spencer Torkelson commented on the team's versatility in finding different ways to win.
Tigers manager A.J. Hinch emphasized the importance of staying grounded and continuing to play well.
Angels manager Ron Washington acknowledged the team's better performance but noted it was not enough to win.
Kenta Maeda reflected on his pitching performance and the advantage of having a lead.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game experienced a lengthy rain delay of 1 hour 50 minutes before starting.
The Tigers moved two games over .500 at 68-66 for the first time since May 7.
Angels starter Griffin Canning took the loss, giving up three runs and five hits and four walks in five innings.
